alert.note: Alert for Fremont County Including Canon City, Howard, Texas Creek (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 09 at 4:02AM MST until March 09 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 222... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 9 AM this morning to 5 PM MST this afternoon. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 222. * Winds...West 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 11 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Fremont County Including Canon City, Howard, Texas Creek
